Job Roles:
UIP staff help keep the improvement district cleaner, by:
– Picking up and disposing of trash left on sidewalks and streets.
– Report potholes, malfunctioning streetlights and traffic signals, damaged pavements and signage.
– Report missing manhole covers and blocked drains
– Report illegal dumping
– Other urban maintenance shortcomings.

Criteria:
Passed Matric, Unemployed, Not currently studying
18 – 30 years old
Have a Smartphone with WhatsApp
Can travel to Prospecton and Durban Central
Able to work 12-hour and night shifts.

To apply, send your CV, ID, Qualifications via the secure link:
https://forms.gle/EDTRgbnkaf7iRui38
